item.title: PROJECT 2 (analytics): SENTIMENT ANALYSIS OF SHOPRITE on Twitter
item.description: Word-cloud of shoprite-related tweets Sentiment-Analysis INTRODUCTION As the saying goes ‘Customer is King’ , hence it’s paramount to put the client first, and try as much as possible to seek and understand there opinion about a product or service. This project is aimed at analyzing: Tweeps (twitter user’s) emotion about shoprite Most occurring words in tweets Top Tweeps on ShopRite trend table.
